name: Voucher Redeemption Report
query:
select s.customer as "Customer Name::150",c.phone_no as "Contact No",c.email_id as "Email ID::150",s.discount_amount as  "Value Of Voucher::150",date(s.creation) as "Voucher Redemption Date::150" ,date(pr.creation) as "Voucher Creation Date::150",pr.buy_back_requisition_ref as "Buy Back Requisition Ref::150",bb.modified_by as "MPO::150",pr.modified_by as "Collection Officer::150",s.modified_by as "Redemption Officer::150", s.expiry_date as "Voucher Expiry::150",
(case when s.mark_voucher_as_redeemed=1 then 'Redeemed' else case  when date(now())<s.expiry_date then 'Pending' else 'Expired' end end)  as "Voucher Status::150"
 from `tabSlot Cashier` s,tabCustomer c,`tabPurchase Receipt` pr ,`tabBuy Back Requisition` bb where s.customer=c.name and pr.pin=s.enter_pin and bb.name=pr.buy_back_requisition_ref
